name: Paymentwall for Jigoshop
author: The Paymentwall Team

sections.description: Paymentwall is the leading all-in-one global payments platform for digital goods and services and supports more than 100 popular local payment options and 75+ currencies, making it easy to monetize globally in more 200+ countries with a single simple integration. Paymentwall is a privately-held company that’s growing fast. It’s headquartered in San Francisco with offices in Kiev, Istanbul, Las Vegas, Amsterdam, Berlin and Manilla and is opening offices in Bejing, Hanoi and Sao Paolo.
sections.installation:
1. Upload paymentwall-for-jigoshop directory to the plugins directory.
  2. Go to the plugins setting page and activate \”Paymentwall for Jigoshop\”
  3. On the left sidebar of your WordPress dashboard, navigate to \”Jigoshop –> Settings\”. Click on the Payment Gateways tab. Paymentwall should already be available as an option.
  4. Find Paymentwall section, and check Enable Paymentwall Solution.
  5. Enter your project and secret keys, widget code, and fill up the other options.
    • The Project key and Secret key are located in your \”Paymentwall Merchant Area –> My Projects\”.
    • The Widget Code is located at the Widgets page.
  6. Click the Save Changes button

View our full installation guide: https://www.paymentwall.com/us/documentation/Jigoshop-WordPress/1168
sections.faq:
• Visit our FAQ: https://www.paymentwall.com/en/faq
  • Developer support team: devsupport@paymentwall.com
sections.changelog:
v1.2.0 [07/10/2015]

  • Support WordPress 4.3.1
  • Update latest Paymentwall PHP lib
  • Add Brick support

v1.1.3 [04/08/2015]

  • Support WordPress 4.2.2
  • Update latest Paymentwall PHP lib
  • Add User Profile API support
